Posts.Content: MarlaCrider wrote: Hi, I'm Marla. I was diagnosed with stage 3 invasive ductal carcinoma 2 months ago. I'm currently receiving chemo treatments and I am live-blogging my experience. While everyone's treatment regimen will be unique, I believe the fear, anxiety, exhaustion, "chemo brain," and emotional rollercoaster is the same for everyone. I hope my blog might help those who find themselves going through the same - and I welcome all the questions, comments and support I can get. Please see www.MarlaCrider.com and follow my Facebook too, if you wish, at www.facebook.com/whomeabreastc... Love, Marla Live blogging my treatment: www.MarlaCrider.com Dx IDC, Stage IIIA Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Live blogging my treatment: I hope it helps you MarlaCrider MarlaCrider
